snippet: LAURO--Louis. The Institute for Psychoanalytic Training and Research mourns the death of our esteemed colleague Louis Lauro. Fellow, training analyst, former President, who guided us with a steady hand, he was a gentle and wise man whose counsel and friendship will be greatly missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LAURO--Louis. The Institute for Psychoanalytic Training and Research mourns the death of our esteemed colleague Louis Lauro. Fellow, training analyst, former President, who guided us with a steady hand, he was a gentle and wise man whose counsel and friendship will be greatly missed. 1/3
